name: Monks of the Shattered Armory
description: Seemingly appearing out of thin air, the Monks of the Shattered Armory arenâ€™t even sure where they themselves are from. Without a known heritage to lean on, they identify as children of the cosmos. They're also known for their prowess with nearly any form of arms. Now a member of a group researching the intersection of Groodu and Rootmason magics, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
